article.title: Boeing to Provide 700 Laser Guidance Kits to U.S. Air Force
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Boeing Company, St. Louis, Missouri, is being awarded an $8,261,510 contract modification to procure an additional 700 precision laser guidance set kits for the U.S. Air Force.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
